description: Hpnotiq Breeze is an excellent drink for any occasion, but it's especially perfect for the holidays. It has all of your favorite holiday flavors, from lime juice, pineapple juice, and rum. The hpnotiq in this drink will have you feeling warm and cozy on even the coldest nights.
name: Hpnotiq Breeze
recipeIngredient: Cocktail cherry and lime slice for the garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Add ice to your cocktail shaker. Add Hpnotiq, rum, lime juice, simple syrup, and pineapple juice.
recipeInstructions.text: Add ice to your cocktail shaker. Add Hpnotiq, rum, lime juice, simple syrup, and pineapple juice.

recipeInstructions.name: Cover and shake well for about 30 seconds until well-mixed and cold.
recipeInstructions.text: Cover and shake well for about 30 seconds until well-mixed and cold.

recipeInstructions.name: Pour the mixture into a martini glass or any other tall glass you have available. Garnish with cherry lime slices.
